article_title: Extending The Children's Health Insurance Program

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act is an endless source of tortured political maneuverings. Another example will soon demand Congress’ attention: Extending the Children’s Health Insurance Program (CHIP).   The program was created in 1997, in the aftermath of the failed Clinton health reform initiative, to provide health coverage for pregnant women and uninsured [...]
article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner
